sentences.en: As the story unfolded throughout the past week, I experienced the gamut of emotions: shock, anger, sadness, disgust, confusion.
sentences.cn: 上周随着故事情节的展开，我的心情可以说是跌宕起伏：从震惊、气愤、悲伤到憎恶与困惑。

sentences.en: Gamut mapping is a key technology for color management.
sentences.cn: 色域匹配是色彩管理的一项关键技术.

sentences.en: He ran the whole gamut of dissipation.
I ran the gamut from confidence to despair.
sentences.cn: 我这是从充满自信到极度失望的巨大落差啊.

sentences.en: Its snarls ran the gamut from pain to terror.
sentences.cn: 它的嗥叫历经了从痛苦到恐怖的各种层面.

sentences.en: On hearing the news, he showed a face a gamut of emotions.
sentences.cn: 听到那个消息之后, 他脸上泛现出百感交集的表情.

sentences.en: Rhine Riesling runs the gamut from dry to sweet.
sentences.cn: 从干的到甜的，莱茵雷斯林白葡萄酒应有尽有。

sentences.en: She ran the whole gamut of the emotions from A to B.
sentences.cn: 她的经历了从A到B的情绪(激动)的整个范围.

sentences.en: She run the whole gamut of the emotions from a to b.
sentences.cn: 她经历了从A到 B的情绪(激动)的整个范围.

sentences.en: The exhibition runs the whole gamut of artistic styles.
sentences.cn: 这次展览包括了所有艺术风格的作品.

sentences.en: The network will provide the gamut of computer services to your home.
sentences.cn: 这个网络将为家庭提供全方位的计算机服务。

sentences.en: The reviews for "On a Clear Day" ran the gamut from contempt to qualified rapture .
sentences.cn: 对于《好日子》的影评毁誉参半，既有人表示不值一提，也有人觉得它带给人一定的惊喜。

sentences.en: The show runs the gamut of 20th century design.
sentences.cn: 展览涵盖20世纪的各种设计。

sentences.en: This poem runs the gamut of emotions from despair to joy.
sentences.cn: 这首诗展现了从绝望到喜悦的感情历程.

sentences.en: Varied though the anthology may claim to be, it does not cover the whole gamut of Scottish poetry.
sentences.cn: 该诗集虽然可能号称收录广泛，但并未涵盖所有苏格兰诗歌。

sentences.en: We had the whole gamut of wind from a dead calm to a force 10 gale.
sentences.cn: 我们这里什么风都有，从风平浪静到十级大风。

words.tran_cn: 全音阶；全音域；整个范围

phrases.tran_cn: 全部经历；全部展示；全部执行
